sentences.en: Google's PageRank is a variant of the Eigenvector centrality measure.
sentences.cn: 谷歌的网页级别是特征向量中心性度量的一个变体。

sentences.en: Yergin starts by reminding us of energy’s centrality to the modern age.
sentences.cn: 耶金开篇就提醒读者能量对当今世界的重要性。

sentences.en: Several others echoed the centrality of water to Pakistan achieving prosperity.
sentences.cn: 另外几位议员也赞成水对于巴基斯坦实现繁荣的核心意义。
